name: Miasma Menace
uniques: [2] free [Miasma Menace] units appear <upon being defeated> <with [33]% chance>
Turn this tile into a [Miasma] tile <upon being defeated>

civilopediaText.text: Hazardous organic particles coalesced into a type of xenofauna that thrives in lands where other species cannot exist. Handle them the wrong way, and their spread will quickly spiral out of control.

name: Wendigo Colossus
uniques: Heals [20] damage if it kills a unit

civilopediaText.text: A vastly more vicious strain of Wendigo with alarming speed and an insatiable hunger for human flesh.
A vastly more vicious strain of Winghead, specially adapted to combat our advanced mecha and drone units.
